name: KILL YOUR FRIENDS
description:
KILL YOUR FRIENDS is a multiplayer online shooter for up to 6 players. Kill your friends, or strangers, or AI using a variety of guns.

This is an early preview of KILL YOUR FRIENDS. The final release will include:

  • More playable characters
  • More weapons including explosives & melee weapons
  • Several different environments with special environmental effects & unique props
  • An in-game store where you can spend your hard-earned coins on cosmetics for your character (no microtransactions)
